name: Enyata
about: Enyata is a technology company providing engineering-as-a-service solutions at scale to organizations across multiple industries. Enyata buildup is a project by Enyata used to provide learning resources/infrastructure and support 10,000 young Africans in their tech growth and journey over the next 5 years.
